title: Return – League of Legends - Novel Updates
author: Beating Coins   跳动的硬币
description:
The ADC for a team that just broke into the LPL (the Chinese Professional League Scene) after winning their last qualifying round, was forced to quit from the team. His hopes dashed and betrayed, he almost gave up the world of eSports.

Will the dream of being a professional player stay a dream, or will he climb back to the top?>
